ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayah_translit: waylun lil'mutaffifina
ayah_english: Woe to those who give less

ayah: وَيۡلٞ لِّلۡمُطَفِّفِينَ
ayah_translit: waylun lil'mutaffifina
ayah_english: Woe to those who give less

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ
ayah_translit: alladhina idha ik'talu ala al-nasi yastawfuna
ayah_english: Those who when they take a measure from the people they take in full

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

ayah: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمۡ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمۡ يُخۡسِرُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha kaluhum aw wazanuhum yukh'siruna
ayah_english: But when they give by measure (to) them or they weigh (for) them they give less

ayah: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ
ayah_translit: ala yazunnu ulaika annahum mab'uthuna
ayah_english: Do not think those that they (will be) resurrected

ayah: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبۡعُوثُونَ

ayah: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: liyawmin azimin
ayah_english: For a Day Great

ayah: لِيَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: liyawmin azimin
ayah_english: For a Day Great

ayah: يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلنَّاسُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: yawma yaqumu al-nasu lirabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: (The) Day will stand mankind before (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ
ayah_translit: kalla inna kitaba al-fujari lafi sijjinin
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed (the) record (of) the wicked (is) surely in Sijjin

ayah: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

ayah: وَمَآ أَدۡرَىٰكَ مَا سِجِّينٞ
ayah_translit: wama adraka ma sijjinun
ayah_english: And what can make you know what (is) Sijjin

ayah: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ
ayah_translit: kitabun marqumun
ayah_english: A book written

ayah: كِتَٰبٞ مَّرۡقُومٞ

ayah_english: A book written

ayah: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
ayah_translit: waylun yawma-idhin lil'mukadhibina
ayah_english: Woe that Day to the deniers

ayah: وَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ
ayah_translit: alladhina yukadhibuna biyawmi al-dini
ayah_english: Those who deny (the) Day (of) the Judgment

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

ayah: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
ayah_translit: wama yukadhibu bihi illa kullu mu'tadin athimin
ayah_english: And not can deny [of] it except every transgressor sinful

ayah: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
ayah_translit: idha tut'la alayhi ayatuna qala asatiru al-awalina
ayah_english: When are recited to him Our Verses he says Stories (of) the former (people)

ayah: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayah_translit: kalla bal rana ala qulubihim ma kanu yaksibuna
ayah_english: Nay! But (the) stain has covered [over] their hearts (for) what they were earning

ayah: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
ayah_translit: kalla innahum an rabbihim yawma-idhin lamahjubuna
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed they from their Lord that Day surely will be partitioned

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayah_translit: thumma innahum lasalu al-jahimi
ayah_english: Then indeed they (surely) will burn (in) the Hellfire

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
ayah_translit: thumma innahum lasalu al-jahimi
ayah_english: Then indeed they (surely) will burn (in) the Hellfire

ayah: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمۡ لَصَالُواْ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

ayah: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
ayah_translit: thumma yuqalu hadha alladhi kuntum bihi tukadhibuna
ayah_english: Then it will be said This (is) what you used (to) [of it] deny

ayah: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
ayah_translit: kalla inna kitaba al-abrari lafi illiyyina
ayah_english: Nay! Indeed (the) record (of) the righteous (will be) surely in Illiyin

ayah_translit: inna al-abrara lafi na'imin
ayah_english: Indeed the righteous (will be) surely in bliss

ayah: تَعۡرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمۡ نَضۡرَةَ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
ayah_translit: ta'rifu fi wujuhihim nadrata al-na'imi

ayah: خِتَٰمُهُۥ مِسۡكٞۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلۡيَتَنَافَسِ ٱلۡمُتَنَٰفِسُونَ
ayah_translit: khitamuhu mis'kun wafi dhalika falyatanafasi al-mutanafisuna
ayah_english: Its seal (will be of) musk And for that let aspire the aspirers

ayah_translit: aynan yashrabu biha al-muqarabuna

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina ajramu kanu mina alladhina amanu yadhakuna
ayah_english: Indeed those who committed crimes used (to) at those who believed laugh

ayah: وَإِذَا مَرُّواْ بِهِمۡ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha marru bihim yataghamazuna
ayah_english: And when they passed by them they winked at one another

ayah: وَإِذَا ٱنقَلَبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمُ ٱنقَلَبُواْ فَكِهِينَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha inqalabu ila ahlihimu inqalabu fakihina
ayah_english: And when they returned to their people they would return jesting

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ

ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-awhum qalu inna haulai ladalluna
ayah_english: And when they saw them they said Indeed these surely have gone astray

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-awhum qalu inna haulai ladalluna
ayah_english: And when they saw them they said Indeed these surely have gone astray

ayah: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡهُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ لَضَآلُّونَ
ayah_translit: wa-idha ra-awhum qalu inna haulai ladalluna
ayah_english: And when they saw them they said Indeed these surely have gone astray

ayah: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: wama ur'silu alayhim hafizina
ayah_english: But not they had been sent over them (as) guardians

ayah: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: wama ur'silu alayhim hafizina
ayah_english: But not they had been sent over them (as) guardians

ayah: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: wama ur'silu alayhim hafizina
ayah_english: But not they had been sent over them (as) guardians

ayah: وَمَآ أُرۡسِلُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
ayah_translit: wama ur'silu alayhim hafizina
ayah_english: But not they had been sent over them (as) guardians

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ
ayah_translit: fal-yawma alladhina amanu mina al-kufari yadhakuna
ayah_english: So today those who believed at the disbelievers they will laugh

ayah: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

ayah: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_translit: ala al-araiki yanzuruna
ayah_english: On the thrones observing

ayah: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_translit: ala al-araiki yanzuruna
ayah_english: On the thrones observing

ayah: عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
ayah_translit: ala al-araiki yanzuruna
ayah_english: On the thrones observing

ayah: هَلۡ ثُوِّبَ ٱلۡكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُواْ يَفۡعَلُونَ
ayah_translit: hal thuwwiba al-kufaru ma kanu yaf 'aluna
ayah_english: Have (not) been paid the disbelievers (for) what they used (to) do
